scripts.build.server: ng build --environment dev --aot --app 0 --output-hashing=all && ng build --environment dev --aot --app 1 --output-hashing=all && rm -rf functions/dist-browser && echo 'deleted dist-browser directory' && cp -r dist functions/dist-browser && echo 'copied dist folder to functions/dist-browser' && mv dist/index.html functions/dist-server && echo 'moved dist/index.html to functions/dist-server' && echo 'done'
scripts.build.server.prod: ng build --prod --aot --app 0 --output-hashing=all && ng build --prod --aot --app 1 --output-hashing=all && rm -rf functions/dist-browser && echo 'deleted dist-browser directory' && cp -r dist functions/dist-browser && echo 'copied dist folder to functions/dist-browser' && mv dist/index.html functions/dist-server && echo 'moved dist/index.html to functions/dist-server' && echo 'done'
scripts.deploy: cd functions && tsc && cd .. && firebase deploy
